name: AUDIS
description:
created by @alexandrabjarg and @gunnarsteinn

sounds by freesound.org, credit to users: ShadyDave, Mitchjohnston, Spleencast, jus, vedas, InspectorJ, KeffyStay, illtype, gluelsobar

WASD to move
mouse click to pick up
ESC to quit
R to restart

all textures made from an image of a frozen windshield on a cold morning in reykjavík
